testcase.system-out: Given the user is on homepage...............................................passed And clicks on "Admin" in sidepanel..........................................passed Then User Management section is displayed...................................passed When Admin clicks on job dropdown...........................................passed And selects "Pay Grades" in the dropdown....................................passed Then "Pay Grades" screen is displayed.......................................passed When Admin clicks on Add button.............................................skipped Then "Add Pay Grade" page is displayed......................................passed And Admin enters Grade 15...................................................passed And Clicks on save button...................................................passed And The "Edit Pay Grade" page is displayed successfully.....................failed Then "Add Currency" section shows up........................................skipped And Admin adds parameters in add currency section INR - Indian Rupee,10000.00 and 25000.00.skipped And Clicks on save button for add currency..................................skipped Then success message is displayed...........................................skipped And currency created with parameters Indian Rupee, 10000.00 and 25000.00 are added to the table.skipped When Admin clicks on cancel button..........................................skipped Then Added paygrade with Grade 15 and Indian Rupee gets listed in pay grade table.skipped
